== Bungeni Editor == 


=== Current Release === 

[http://bungeni-editor.googlecode.com/files/install-1.0.1713.jar Bungeni Editor v1.0.1713 - requires OpenOffice.org 3.2.1] - Various fixes -- updating the bill document type which was crashing earlier.



=== Older Releases === 

[http://bungeni-editor.googlecode.com/files/install-1.0.1671.jar Bungeni Editor v1.0.1671 - requires OpenOffice.org 3.2.1] - Added user interface for locale selection

[http://bungeni-editor.googlecode.com/files/install-1.0.1654.jar Bungeni Editor v1.0.1654 - requires OpenOffice.org 3.2.1] - Added support for i18n message translations, upgraded to h2b new database format.


[http://code.google.com/p/bungeni-editor/downloads/detail?name=install-1.0-rel-branch-r1514.jar Bungeni Editor v1.0.1514 beta - requires Openoffice.org 3.1.1] - UI upgrade, enable judgement panels.

[http://code.google.com/p/bungeni-editor/downloads/detail?name=install-0.9.1419.jar Bungeni Editor v0.9.1419 - requires OpenOffice.org 3.1.1] - 19 May 2009 _Updates  : ODF 1.2 compatible release. Minor fixes and improvements in translator. Templates do not have gradient backgrounds anymore_


[http://code.google.com/p/bungeni-editor/downloads/detail?name=install-0.9.958.jar Bungeni Editor v0.9.958 - requires OpenOffice.org 3.1.1]
